channel.title: Client Cache Download problems Please anyone Why wont no one help
channel.description:
yo can anyone help me with client cache problems i have a client that wont download the cache and i have another client the works and its my server but i manually downloaded it but how do i get other people to download the cache when iam running the server its a pi source btw anyone can help or teamviewer me?
do i need to make an auto cache downloader or what somone please explain or tv pl0x
i tried to fix by making an auto downloader cache thing and i get this error when i run it now im getting close to fixing it my self no one is helping me no one here does
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Cache123\Cache123.rar?dl=1 (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.downloadcache(client.java:4890) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4707) at client.startUp(client.java:9792) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:99) at client.run(client.java:6409) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
